mapper.select: SELECT NW.WEBTOON_NUM, NW.WEBTOON_TITLE, NW.WEBTOON_COVER, W.WEEK_DAY FROM NAVER_WEBTOON NW LEFT JOIN WEBTOON_WEEK WW ON NW.WEBTOON_NUM = WW.WEBTOON_NUM LEFT JOIN WEEK W ON WW.WEEK_NUM = W.WEEK_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WEBTOON_EPISODE (EPISODE_NUM, EPISODE_TITLE, EPISODE_TEXT, EPISODE_COVER, WEBTOON_NUM) VALUES (W_E_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{episodeTitle}, #{episodeText}, #{episodeCover}, #{webtoonNum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WEBTOON_EPISODE WHERE episode_NUM = #{episode_NUM} AND webtoon_NUM = #{webtoon_NUM}
